27.changes: Added the missing resource nhurgite to the market page

24.changes: Set the max towing value from 120'000 tons to 1'000'000 tons

23.changes: Corrected a bug on the thruster optimisation that could crash the website

22.changes: Corrected issues with the dark mode making the charts difficult to read

21.changes:
- Added value tables to the armor optisation page
- Made all value tables interactible and sortable

20.changes:
- Added a armor optimisation calculator
- Updated the header to accommodate the new and future calculators

19.changes: added a round stack button for the capship price calculator

17.changes: reorganized the display of the ship calculator to regroup the related elements together

16.changes:
- implemented the combat stats on the ship calculator
- shuffled the the layout of the ship calculator to regroup related elements
- stats get hidden if there is no value to show
- bug fixes

15.changes: made the code of the website partially open source at https://github.com/HappyTrigger42/starbase-tools

14.changes:
- implemented MoriWatari's speed calculation
- added warnings on the absence of maneuver thrusters for the calculations

13.changes: Added a values page to make it easier to see what the calculators are using as input values but also make it easier to contest a value

12.changes: Added the thruster optimisation prototype calculator ( will require polishing )

11.changes:
- added warnings on the speed display of ships to indicate issues with propellant
- added wright display on flight stats for the ship

10.changes:
- corrected an issue with the CSS on the footer for mobile
- automated removal of the first '0' of a user input
- added icons for the ship calculator ( more to come )

- corrected an issue with the CSS on the homepage for mobile
- Started implementing the new wallpapers
- attribution for the website and the logo in the footer

8.changes:
- Corrected the french translation
- Corrected an issue with cap ship calculator

6.changes:
- values no longer get erased when going from one page to another
- added a reset button to erase all values
- added the possibility of sharing links containing all the data

5.changes: changed the layout of the calculator in order to make it more readable and added the possibility of showing / hiding stats

4.changes: corrected the issue with direct access to the urls causing a 404 error
